parameters.name: Description
parameters.value:
Check for below Scenario from Application Data Capture
Scenario:Verify the OPD limits for Family Floater Policy & Policy tenure is 3 Years
2) Product Name : Aarogya Plus
3) Policy Plan :  Family Floater
4) Business Type : New Business
5) Members : 2A +2C (Spouse +Mother+ Daughter + Son)
6) Highest Highest Member Age Band  :  
SPouse : 42 age ,SI : 3Lac,Premium  17800
Mother : 45 age, SI : 3Lac, Premium : 17800
Daughter : 15 age, SI : 3Lac, Premium : 17800
Son : 11 age, SI : 3Lac, Premium : 17800

7)Trigger point: OPD limit should be as per rate chart premium 
2. Maternity limit should be same as OPD expense & System should give maternity validation for Daughter 
8) VP: OPD(maternity) limit should be same for all members in case of Family Floater 3 years tenure Policy also policy should get issued
